channel.title: wcfactory
channel.description: Documentation and tutorials on using WCFactory

item.title: Home
item.description: WCFactory is short for Web component factory. It's tooling that automates the need to configure and understand...Yarn WorkspacesLerna monoreposBuild routines for web componentsBuilding and sustain

item.title: Terms
item.description: Web component - a four part meta-specification of the browser that allows us to build self contained, scoped, valid HTML tags by extending the HTMLElement as a class based object of the browser.Mono

item.title: Tutorials
item.description: Here's a playlist we'll update with videos related to WCfactory

item.title: Contributing
item.description: If you'd like to contribute to WCFactory, check out our git repo.If you'd like to contribute to the elements that make up this website, check out our monorepo produced and managed by WCFactory.If

item.title: FAQ
item.description: There's a lot going on here, can't you make this easier?We're working on a UI that helps in running the commands but organizing and managing a company library / brand for your organization is tricky.
